name: Bunny Adventure: Rabbits Kidnapped
description:
Original Gamejolt version: https://gamejolt.com/games/bunnyadventurethree/796220

Oh no! The cube monsters kidnapped all the bunnies to make soup. You must save them! Play as 2 cute bunnies, Steve and Peter in an epic adventure.

Features:

-Deal with evil Oreo cookies on Oreo Mountain

-Find all 10 carrots

-Eat roasted marshmallows at a campfire with your friends

-Meet epic memes: eat a lot of ketchup with Sans, get help from Captain Cheems, play a weird arcade machine built by Big Chungus, use the power of m e m e s to defeat the final boss

-Fall for a free candy scam then escape the scammer's house

-Shoot some evil biscuits

-Exponentially better that the other two Bunny Adventure games

-Epic tutorial character Super Mighty Figthy Mole

-and so much more!

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, click on attack options to use them, press space to jump (when you find the Jumping Shoes), press WASD to shoot (when you find the gun) and press Z to pass trough text.

Don't forget to play the other two bunny adventure games before playing this one, because there are spoilers.
